snippet: The Los Angeles police said a former officer was targeting members of the department and their families. His truck was found burned near a ski area east of Los Angeles.
abstract: Los Angeles authorities say Christopher J Dorner, former Navy reservist who was fired from LA Police Department in 2008, has gone on murderous rampage aimed at police and their families; say he has killed at least three people, including 11-year veteran of Riverside Police Dept, setting off huge manhunt across Southern California.

byline.original: By ADAM NAGOURNEY and IAN LOVETT
byline.contributor: Nuran Alteir contributed reporting from La Palma, Calif.; Will Carless from San Diego; and Kitty Bennett from Tampa, Fla.

lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles police said a former officer was targeting members of the department and their families. His truck was found burned near a ski area east of Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Former Los Angeles Police Officer Sought in Shootings
headline.main: Manhunt On for Ex-Officer Accused of Police Vendetta
headline.print_headline: Manhunt On for Ex-Officer Accused of Police Vendetta
